content.detailedDescription:
Saw 2 unidentified objects in the air. hovering and stationary. recorded the event. video here:(you tube link removed to fi report field) cms 08/23/11 23:11 cst flg

saw the first object (most visible in video) disappear within 5 mins of identifying and then recording. the second object was faint, stationary for longer period before it too disappeared from sight. 

both objects were stationary as compared to a plane flying south to north that was also captured in the same video going under the object.
content.summary: Ufo hovering over nyc 8/23/2011

content.detailedDescription: I was heading north on hwy 1 just after the sun went down in southern mendocino county on monday august 22, 2011 at 8:25pm. there were a few clouds on the lower horizon and the rest of the sky was clear except what looked like a con trail way up above the clouds to the right of the sun over the ocean.  at first i thought it was a missile. i pulled over and lost track of the con trail because it quickly disappeared. as i scanned the sky again and found the object. now there were two con trails close together and the object rose at a steady rate up into the sky higher and higher until it vanished into the blue sky. the event lasted no more than 5 minutes. i thought it might be a rocket sent into space, but from where would it have been launched? i've never seen any space launches from the north coast of california. no news of any space launch that i know of was deployed on monday night. no other jets or helicopters appeared so i drove on north.
content.summary: It looked like a rocket or space shuttle, then it vanished into atmosphere

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my dog out for her evening walk around 9:45pm, as i do every night.  as i was putting her leash and harness on her i noticed that she was far more excitable than is normal for her.  as i walked outside on my back stairs, it sounded as if all dogs in the neighborhood were yelping and howling at the same time.  i looked up, and out in front of me, moving over several houses and trees was a jumble of extremely bright, white lights, which appears to be flashing in a sequence.  the lights were approximately 500-600 feet above ground and moving in a straight flight path away from my house (difficult to determine exact altitude, as the object/lights was above and moving away from me).  as they passed over a far tree line, the lights/object banked to the left and then to the right, revealing what appeared to be a disc shape to the object to which they were presumably attached (based on the alignment of the lights; i could see the same lights curving around each side towards the front of the object as it banked in each direction).  as the object banked, i could not see a solid shape per se, but the space between the lights was solid black.  the object cleared the tree line and disappeared from my sight.  the object made no apparent noise.

i live under several approach/take-off routes to boston's logan airport, so i am used to seeing several airplanes per night on my walks with my dog.  this did not appear to be within one of those normal flight paths, nor did the lights appear to be aircraft warning lights, as all were very bright white and flashed in sequence around the object.  further, the banking maneuvers to both the left and then the right did not appear to be typical of fixed wing aircraft that i normally observe.

when the object passed from sight, the dogs in the area ceased barking/yelping and my own dog calmed down.  i did not see the object again that night.
content.summary: A multitude of extremely bright, white, flashing lights.  dogs flipping out

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting #1 revere mn
stepped outside, sky was clear, looked up and said do see that satellite? it was heading north. then we noticed a second satellite heading south. as they pated in close proximity, the north bound one disappeared. the south bound one stopped. the color was amber/orange. the object started zig zagging then stopped. a short distance away, we saw a light of the same color come on. then they both zigged zagged some then stopped. i grabbed my binoculars and looked up. that is when i noticed there was what appeared to be 5 different colored lights. they also appeared to be chevron shaped. after about 20-30 minutes, a third object appeared. that too, zig-zagged in the sky then stopped. again we could see different colored lights. we also witnessed that they would just disappear. then the lights would come back on. they appeared to be stationary when this was done. about another 10 minutes later, we saw a very bright sphere appear out of know where the streak off to the southwest at an extremely high rate of speed. this was just a second in duration. this was all witnessed by six people.

we were all astonished at what we seen. we have never seen anything like this.

sighting #2
walnut grove, mn. about 1 am on the 23rd of aug. we were outside watching an approaching thunderstorm with an immense amount of lighting. i thought the storm was moving to the south east vice east. i noticed a star to the northwest. my wife said the was a plane because the oject was moving slow. again, the object was on a straight path then changed direction instantly. the object appeared sphere in shape and yellow/red in color. this object zig-zagged also then hovered. it appeared the object would zig-zag in conjunction with the lighting. it appeared to remain at the edge of the storm. we watched this for about 15 minutes. the object was stationary and a constant color when the object just turn off the light. we did not see it again.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Observed multiple objects, at two different locations. four out of the five objects were very high in altitude. the second sighting with the storm was lower.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the hot tub and remained there throughout the sighting.  i noticed the object in the north east sky.  at first i thought it was a balloon, but a commercial aircraft from mitchel airport eclipsed the object and i relized that it was further and larger than i had originally thought.  the object's path brought it closer (view direction now ene) and i could see it more clearly.  it was a light/pastel yellowish circle with light brownish petals.  it looked like a sort of sunflower.  nothing on the object moved.  it's path was gently irratic, like a baloon, but it was moving much too fast to be a baloon.  the object moved at about the same altitude across to the ese where it seemed to line up closely to another low altitude commercial  aircraft that was moving in a northerly direction.  finally, the object (now se) made some final irratic, smooth motions and headed vertical until it disappeared from sight.

the most curious thing about the sighting was that the appearance of the object never varied.  i always had the same exat appearance.  the petal-like protuberances remained in the same orientation throughout the sighting.  it was like it was staring at me the whole time.

i didn't notice any odd feelings or sensations during the sighting, but now i find myself continually watching the sky.  it's a mystery that chews at me.

note the attached drawing of the object was done in openoffice.
content.summary: Spherical object with petal-like protuberances traveled across sky; eclipsed by commercial aircraft; flew close to second commercial aircraft

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were setting on my front porch in salem, indiana discussing war events in history. when a jet way off in the sky started into our field of view. i noticed the jet and watched it for a few minutes as we were talking. there were 2 stars in the sky in it's region and had been there all night. i watch the stars as i set on the porch usually and when the jet passed one something seemed different like when your setting still next to a train and it begins to move. you don't know whether your moving or the train. the jet seemed to set still until i realized the "star" that had been there for the last hour since it got dark was actually moving also. i told my friend to look and it had already caught his eye also. i cant give an accurate distance it traveled but it was moving about the same pace as the jet was moving. then it just disappeared after 30 seconds or so of travel and didn't return. i dont know if this was a ufo or not. but whatever it was it stayed still for at least an hour before it moved only to disappear.
content.summary: Light in sky at night thought it was a star, began to move then just disapeered

content.detailedDescription: On august 16 i was flying from chicago illinois to portland oregon and about 50 minutes before landing i saw a black object outside the window.  it was all black with no visible canopy, and a looked similar to the x-15 spaceplane but a little bit wider and with smaller(but still noticeable) wings. it was descending very fast; at least 3/2 glide path, and it had a twin all black contrail. i do not know the size of the object or how far away it was, but i would guess about a mile away and 70-80ft long.  it was moving very fast and moved across my field of view through the window in about 5 seconds.  i do not know where we were over but it there was a desert plaine with mountians of 3 sides. by the time i thought to wake the person sitting next to me the object was out of sight.
content.summary: Strange object seen out of airliner

content.detailedDescription:
I observed 3 lights above the deset sky at about 3am. i was traveling south on highway 95, heading towrds las vegas. i observed a lightning storm ahead of me about 40-60 miles ahead of me. i also observed a commercial air liner traveling ne in the night sky. 
as i was watching the air liner, a large white light or orb appeared in the sky. it fades into view for a second, then faded away. then another light appeared next to that, fading in and out and then finally a third light appeard after that. all in succession or sequence. then they were gone. clear summer night with 3/4 moon for light. i could clearly see the mountain range below the lights. there were no radio or transmission towers near my location. it was not that. i observed for about 10 minutes and the event did not happen again. 
as i drove further, about 45 min since the light event, i slowed down to observe what looked like flashlights being used in the middle of the desert. i saw what appeared to be 6-8 flashlights being used to search the desert floor for something. like watching people search for their car keys or something. the lights scanned the desert floor in random patterns. i slowed to about 10 mph to look for the vehicle that might have brought the persons out to the desert. no vehicle in sight. nothing. then i stopped completely and turned to look at the lights again. i could see the lights dancing about the desert floor but i could not see any people. no one there holding a flashlight, just the lights. there was no origin of the lights. no people, no flashlights. just the circle of lights on the ground. this happened again about 5 min further down the road. this time the lights were light small led bulbs lit on the desert floor. about 20 yards off the highway. all clustered together in a random pattern. about 10-12 small lights, glowing about 6" off the ground. i stopped my vehicle and got my flashlight and went to investigate. i arrived at the area where the lights were, but they were gone and left no trace.
content.summary: 3 solid lights, flashed in progression. several smaller lights on desert  floor

content.detailedDescription:
I needed to take a break from my job and decided to step outside to have a cigarette. i exited my place of business at 10:35 p.M. and began to walk across the back parking lot when my eyes caught a really bright white light in between these two radio/tv towers located a little ways from where i actually work in mill creek township up from the mall area.

i was alone, and decided to head on over to an area most of us 3rd shifters go for our breaks. it's near the building etc. anyhow, i kept my eyes on this bright white light, at first i thought it was maybe a helicopter or airplane. it isn't usual to spot those at night in our area especially at that time of night. only i kept thinking to myself that it would probably be too dangerous for one of these usual aircrafts to be flying so close in between these two radio/tv towers like that.

this light stayed consistent for a couple more seconds then began to dim down and change to a blueish/white kind of light before going back to a very bright constant type of light. another thing i thought was odd was the fact that this light/object did not seem to change its path it just hovered there and continued to do this for another couple of minutes before getting really close to the right radio/tv tower, fade out and completely disappear from the night sky.

i continued to stay there for another ten minutes or so scanning the night sky in that direction to see if this object/light would re-appear closer to where i was standing. at this time, i was still hoping that whatever i saw between those two towers would get closer to where i happened to be and reveal to me what exactly it was hence an actual airplane or helicopter but this did not happen.

so, i gave up and headed on back into the building and to work. never telling anyone else what i witnessed etc.
content.summary: This object held its position between two radio/tv towers

content.detailedDescription:
On august 18th, 2011, at 8:40p.M., while loading supplies in my semi-trailer at a friends shop in falcon, colorado, a large, bright sphere of light caught my eye. when i looked over at the light, i saw what appeared to be a very large, white glowing light that was moving slowly and what seemed to be, very low altitude. i also noticed a higher flying airplane that clearly had it's aircraft light blinking and it was headed right for the sphere type light. at one point, the airplane flew directly over-top of the sphere. i thought they were going to hit each other, they did not, but i could see that the plane was clearly flying, "above" the object.

as time went on, i watched the object move slowly ina north-east direction, as it appeared to be following the hyw 24 path out of falcon and headed for the town of calhand, co. the object would move very slow, then seem to speed up, only to slow down again. it appeared to make slight turns to the right and left but i can not be sure of this because of the distance i was fron the object. about 20 minutes passed until when it finally faded from my sight and disappeared.

i have seem a number of objects flying in this part of the county, this is the first object i felt needed to be reported and had some credibility to it. falcon colorado, seems to be a very active area for ufo sightings. if i'm seeing them, there surely are others that are seeing them too.
content.summary: Stepped out of my semi-trailer that i was un-loading, my eye caught an extremely bright pulsating light moving very slowly directly above the town of falcon, co. and moving in a

content.detailedDescription: Laying in my parents bed they have high rise ceilings and large glass windows i have a small child i was up with at 2 once he started falling asleep i was laying here watching what i thought was a plane until it did nit keep going it came back, went upslowly went down moved weird i kept watching it for some reason i was trying to make an explanation... i watched it fir about 35 min and it was going high over my house. i lost track of it freaked out and tried to go to sleep, it's scaring me so i am trying to find ways to make me feel better i tried to record it with my i touch but it would not pick up that small of light in the dark
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I did not want to believe it continued to stare. freaked out by this, i don't want people to think i'm crazy

content.detailedDescription: Step out side seen this flash of light round moving west to east just a strik it made a 45 angel turn north and didn't slow. step back in an told my family and got a lot of yuckand jokesabout a week later me and my son cody went out at the same time when i seen it siting about the same place that it made that turn when i pointed at it an my son said i see it now it flashed across the ski so fast it was a quick look but he put his arm around my neck an said i'll never make fun of u no more after a little shiver  we talked a out my cam that i had to watch my male box trying go catch the guys that were smashing boxes right at day brick in the last fraim that my recorder every took there was these t like a old coffee saucer an thay were pass��� something from one to the other look to b over douglas lake only got 1 frame but my recorder was only set 40 feet to pop a still that the last tome that it ever worked fried out on that pic. took it to get it fixed an it was fried   dident have the money for the tec that check it out so i lost the flash card there was no wind blowing a com still morring no other moving in the pic befor or after like to never got the flash card out got one more but it flipped me out happen the last full moon just about where they was in the sky but never moved off but had lights and while looking at it it made the land look like a photo negative then it wood go back and change done this 4 times i watch it 4 over an hr got tired am quet but i no it was not a satilight couse it clear now and no light
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Went out side seem round light w to e 45 turn north an gone 2time pointed at it son seen it an it took off to fast t figure

content.detailedDescription: I first saw this same exact ufo on april 12th,2011...Well tonight august 23rd,2011 it has shown up again??? it is very large it has 3 red rectangular lights...It is one of my best pictures i have captured to date..I think these web cams have infared capability, it's the only way to explain these images i capture... everyone thinks & tells me they are planes and helicopters...I really dont think so. i also caught a large cylinder shaped ufo..Its very big..& bright...And some strange objects on the east river..Look at my pictures, they are real !!! i wish someone would just look into this already...Hey bill birnes call me...Lol !!!
content.summary: Ufos back again over brooklyn ny !!!

content.detailedDescription:
My dad saw a white puff thing, then saw a darkish gray ufo like thing. he got a video.

he was out looking at what he thought was a star in broad daylight flashing orange and other colors, he was hoping to get it on video with his camera so he proceeded to record, he didn't get the orange light on video.

what he did get after later review was a white puffy structure which is not a cloud, and then a grey classic ufo looking thing. later in the video there is a bird flying through the frame.

(you tube link moved to investigators report field) cms flg 08/23/11 09:57cst 

i edited this video for this report.
content.summary: My dad saw a white puff thing, then saw a darkish gray ufo like thing. he got a video.

content.detailedDescription:
I was inside watching cable tv. it started having trouble with the reception when a helicopter  loudly passed overhead.   i ran outside to look, since it is unusual for one to pass so low at such a late hour, although we are not all that far from dulles airport, and see them occasionally during the day, or before 9 pm.
i saw a large,round brilliant, unwaveringly bright white light, closely followed by the helicopter, which had blinking red and white lights, seen from my angle of vision.  they were heading east, in a straight-line path.  the helicopter was following closely; the object was larger than the helicopter, but made no discernable noise.  the helicopter was quite close to the object and obviously tailing it. i watched it until it flew out of sight, over the distant tree line.
i've seen helicopters at night before; even tandem pairs,  but never one following another, obviously different type of aircraft so closely.
content.summary: Brilliant round white light, larger than the following helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
Mufon report
august 22, 2011

my wife and i were vacationing at the gettysburg farms campground located at 6200 big mount road in the dover township of pennsylvania ��� 17315.  during the week that we spent at the campground, (monday, 08/15/2011 through monday, 08/22/2011), on four separate occasions mysterious items/vehicles were seen to be flying through the sky, over the campground, during the early evening hours, just after dusk.
these items were observed to be dark in color, ���possibly��� triangular shaped with what appeared to be flames being emitted from the bottom of same.  these flames were not stationary as lights would be, but appeared to flicker, just as the exhaust of a rocket would.  these flames were bright orange in color and are what caught the eye first.  these strange occurrences were observed by ourselves and another couple with whom we were camping.  on the first occasion there were several other campers in the area, who also observed these strange vehicles/craft and commented that et had arrived.  i cannot provide any additional information on these other campers, with the exception of the couple that we were with.  on each of these occasions the strange vehicles were observed be flying slowly at approximately the altitude that a small plane would be at, but appeared to be moving slower than a small plane would fly.  the unknown vehicles/craft did not make any discernible noises, but moved silently across the sky.  during each of the sightings, none of the mysterious craft/vehicles was observed to make any sudden or erratic movements. 
during each occurrence the strange vehicles/craft appeared in the eastern sky without warning and without making any obvious noise or sudden movements.  the following is what was observed by this writer and three others;

���	monday, 08/15/2011 ��� initial observation of the above described vehicle/craft.  two craft were observed.  at approximately 8:40 pm, a single mysterious craft appeared over the tree line, out of the eastern sky and preceded in a westerly direction, when almost over our position on the ground, the craft turned in a southerly direction.  while watching this craft for approximately 1.5 to 2.0 minutes as it was moving away from us, a second unknown craft was observed to come from approximately the same spot in the sky as the first and followed basically the same route as the first in a southerly direction.  both of the unknown craft were observed to simply dissolve or disappear while moving away from the campground.  they did not put on any burst of speed, but simply disappeared at what could have been about ��� to ��� mile away from where we were standing.  this sighting was totally unexpected as we were not expecting anything like this to occur.  we were just sitting outdoors and playing cards at the site picnic table.
���	tuesday, 08/16/2011 ��� nothing suspicious observed as we were not available to be looking at the sky or expecting a recurrence of the prior evenings sighting.
���	wednesday, 08/17/2011 ��� second sighting of the same type of the above described mysterious vehicle/craft.  two craft were observed this date at approximately 8:45 pm.  the first mysterious craft was observed to be approaching the campground from the eastern sky, in a westerly direction.  this craft was moving silently and smoothly just as the craft of the monday night sightings.  this first craft veered off in a northerly direction and was still in sight when a second craft was observed to materialize from approximately the same area of the sky as the first and then followed the same route that the first vehicle/craft had taken.  in approximately 1 to 2 minutes both of the craft disappeared.  again this appeared to occur without any increase in speed and the point of disappearance was approximately ��� to ��� of a mile distant.  again the four of us were playing cards and not expecting to see anything unusual.
���	thursday, 08/18/2011 ��� third sighting of the mysterious, above described vehicle/craft at approximately 8:45 pm.  as described above the mysterious craft appeared in the eastern sky, heading in a westerly direction, moving at the same pace and noiselessly as on prior occasions.  the craft turned in a northerly direction and maintained a steady pace until it disappeared in approximately the same position as the previous evening.  there was only one craft observed on this date.  due to the two previous sightings we were looking for a reaccurrence of the sighting.
���	friday, 08/19/2011 ��� nothing observed, however, it was well past 9:00 pm by the time we remembered to look for any strange occurrences in the sky.
���	saturday, 08/20/2011 ��� fourth sighting of the mysterious, above described vehicle/craft at approximately 8:30 pm.  as previously described the first unknown craft appeared, heading in a westerly direction from out of the eastern sky.  this vehicle/craft turned in a northerly direction and was followed in about one minute by a second vehicle, materializing out of approximately the same position in the eastern sky and followed the route of the 1st craft.  within another minute the 2nd vehicle/craft was followed by a 3rd vehicle/craft which appeared in approximately the same position as the first two, followed the same route and all three vehicles/craft disappeared within approximately three minutes, without any apparent increase in speed.  again we were sitting outdoors, playing cards and not really expecting to see anything.
���	sunday, 08/21/2011 ��� nothing unusual was observed this date.  we sat outdoors from approximately 8:15 pm through 10:00 pm seeking suspicious occurrences, however, without seeing anything suspicious or unusual.

it should be noted that during the times of these observations there were quite a few airliners and small planes observed in the area.  engine noises were evident from these normal planes; however, except for the change in course from the first night nothing about the description or actions of the mysterious vehicles/craft deviated in any way, with the exception of the numbers observed daily.  daily, these mysterious vehicles/craft were very distinctive as due to the flames under the craft, they glowed orange and almost appeared to be on fire, except there was no apparent emergency.  these vehicles/craft were distinctly different from the normal airplanes observed.  you will notice that all four of the occurrences described above happened between 8:30 and 9:00 pm nightly, just about when darkness was falling and making it difficult to obtain a really good view of the mysterious craft(s).  the only viewing devices on hand was a pair of 7x35 binoculars which did not provide a good view of these craft.
on saturday, 08/20/2011, i contacted john ventre, director for pennsylvania chapter of mufon, (before the saturday sightings), and he requested that i submit this report and advise what we had seen.  i had contacted him in order to determine if anyone else had reported seeing anything similar to what we had seen and he advised that he was not totally up to date on the reports, as he had been out of town for several days.  i had advised john ventre that while we were camping internet access was unavailable and that i would file a sighting report this date after arriving at home and having access to the internet.
content.summary: Sighting of flying craft on 4 nights, glowing with flames, no landings observed, no sudden movements

content.detailedDescription: On august 12th, 2011, i made a trip to knoxville, tennessee to see a friend.  i had decided to stay the night because we would be going shopping and golfing the next day.  at 10:05 pm that evening my friend went out to his car to grab a few items so i decided to go out and have a cigarette while he was outside.  the moon was fairly low and bright so i looked up at the sky to stargaze for a bit.  when i looked to my right (nw direction) i saw a very bright white star-like light that was moving very slowly across the sky directly towards me.  i told my friend to take a look and he said he thought it was a plane.  i told him i didn't think so, because it appeared to be flying very low and almost too slow to be an airplane.  the light was nearly as bright as the moon and was steadily burning, with no pulses or flashing of any kind.  the object continued to move towards us and passed almost directly over our position and continued past in at a southeast heading.  there was no sound that i could hear before or after the object passed over us.  after passing overhead i noticed a plane flying at an intersecting angle toward the object, and after their paths crossed, the plane began to turn back toward the object.  two more planes appeared in my peripheral vision, following the path of the object and traveling at a much faster speed, as if they were trying to catch up to it.  as the object moved further away i noticed it began to dim and eventually disappeared in the night sky.  i found this very peculiar as there were no clouds or fog that night and the planes that were following it were still visible at that distance.  after returning to the house i felt very excited because i had never seen something this strange before, and ufo's and extra-terrestrials had always peaked my curiosity.  i didn't know what to do about it until i watched a program about ufo's and heard about mufon, so i decided to share my experience.
content.summary: Bright light moving slowly over knoxville, tn

content.detailedDescription:
Even though i���ve always believed sky ships were real, i���d never seen one until i was driving home on july 20, 2010.  i was headed south on highway 441 about 9:40 p.M.  as i came upon the exxon station just south of dillsboro, i had a strong feeling i should look up. 
as i turned my eyes toward the black night sky, there it was hovering just 50 feet over the highway.   it was a narrow, rectangular ship that appeared to be about 50 to 60 feet wide and 20 feet high.   the ship had dim lights in no particular order.  there were maybe four or five long, vertical lights salmon amber in color.  the ship hovered at a slight angle as though it might be circling or perhaps seeking a place to land or crashing.  i have taken flying lessons and flown over this area so i know the terrain. 
i heard a loud, screeching noise behind it ��� like the sound of a jumbo jet about to land.  the thought crossed my mind that military jets might be chasing it.  of course, jets couldn���t fly that low and would have been forced to abruptly regain altitude. 
since there was no place to pull off the highway where i felt comfortable enough to stop at night to observe it, i drove on home.  as i passed under the ship i did look back but couldn���t see a thing. 
my immediate feeling upon seeing the ship was one of wonder.  i felt surprisingly calm and also experienced a light tingling sensation.  reflecting back on the experience, it was an answer to a week-long request to see a ship for myself.  what an honor to actually see one! 
but the story doesn't end there.  for ten (10) consecutive nights i awakened exactly two seconds before 1 a.M. totally refreshed after only sleeping three (3) hours.  i was given a 'knowing' that we must become economically sustainable immediately.  that means we have to live in small communities, eat locally, consume only what we need locally.
content.summary: The space craft was hovering over the highway, 35 feet above.

content.detailedDescription: Driving on 422 east bound @7:55 am on 8/22/11 i spotted in the sky a very bright reflection from what i thought was an airplane.  it was round an bright and then it simply vanished.  i kept looking but there was no airplane in the area.  then it appeared again slightly to the left of where it originally appeared.  i was looking right at it and it disappeared again like it just all of the sudden became invisible.  then briefly, there was a static sound emitted from my car speakers.  i thought i was just seeing things but as i was coming around the bed from oaks heading into trooper i saw it again this time over the valley forge area.  same thing...Bright light about the size of a penny from my view on the road, and then gone.  again i looked for a plane but there was no plane.  i am not a big believer in ufos but what i experienced today has really baffled me.  when i got to work i googled ufo and 422 and to my surprise i happened upon a recent article about a sighting off of 422 in the same area a few weeks ago.  so...I figured this would be worth reporting as well.
content.summary: Bright disappearing lights in the sky over 422

content.detailedDescription:
At app. 2pm 7/31/11 i was traveling west bound on route 2 at the acton / littleton line.
it was a sunny day with mid level fair weather clouds.
as i came around the curve, and up a slight rise, i saw a reflective black tube shaped object traveling in a easterly direction.  i believe it was about 30 feet long and 6 feet in diameter.  the object was tumbling end over end.  the object was 2-300 feet high.  
as i drove under it, i remembered i had my camera in the car.  i stopped in the area of the newtown road exit, and got out with my camera.  the object was now at an altitude of 1000-1500 feet, still traveling east.  
i used a 35 mm pentax k1000 with asa 200 film with a 35-80 zoom lens at 80, focus at infinity.  two pictures are attached
i realized the object was traveling to fast to catch up to on the highway.  i checked my watch and continued to my destination.  i mailed the film for development the next day.  i had a digital copy made as well as film and photo.
content.summary: Black tube shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep around 6.15am my son woke me up saying there was a ufo outside. he was lying in his bed and he has a big window besides his bed he told me he was looking outside when he noticed a bright light due east out over the ocean. he was fascinated by the beautiful colors that were emitting from it. then suddenly it split into two objects then he jumped up and woke me up and we both went out on our back porch and that's when i saw it he was describing to me about how it split in two halves then went back together. i thought he may have just mistakenly thought that part. i got my binoculars  so i could get a better look at it. when i looked at it i just saw multiple colors flashing at a rapid rate. it was the most beautiful thing i've ever seen. i have spent 40 plus years as being a boat captain and spending many hours out there and have seen all kinds of unexplained crafts over the years but this one really got my attention because of the unusually bright colors coming from it. as we watched in awe it split apart again and we started hollering loud because we knew it was something serious. i called my nephew to see if he could see it. he was out on a shrimpboat working and he answered. i asked to look to the east and see if he could see it. i was telling him we were seeing an object out that way. he instantly started shouting  god look at all those colors. he got the crew on board to look too. i could hear them shouting in the background. they saw it and we all were having an adrenaline rush. my son stayed as long as he could before he had to leave for work. he was about to get in his vehicle and started singing a verse from an old stix song. we thought that they were angels but much to my surprise. we climed aboard that spaceship,and headed for the skies.  i sat there for a few more minuates and it finally just disappeared  in thin air. words can't explain the excitement we felt and it was like we all saw something very unique and i know it was a special event and it doesn't matter if people are gonna blow it off and say we saw a planet or a star or swamp gas. we saw it and that's a fact.  the moon was overhead and venus was close to the moon and was clear as a bell. what we saw wasn't any of that. i'm sure!  it was so brilliant and the bright colors around the outer edge were flashing beautiful colors so fast it was unbelievable. after that i came back inside and just thought  wow! that wasn't the first time we've seen ufos and we all know that there's more life in the cosmos than our minds can comprehend. people need to accept that and move on. i wish we could have had all of the skeptics with us this morning and let them tell us it was a weather balloon. haha  what we saw would of sent them to a mental institution. especially when it jumped apart and turned into two objects.
content.summary: My son was about to go to work and woke me up   we saw the craft split in half then went back together it was awesome it was so bright and the outer edges were flashing beautiful colors

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving work with 2 other witnesses and i saw in the east, a very bright large orange light moving in a north to south direction.  my first reaction was that this was a meteor or space junk burning up in the atmosphere.  after a few moments, i discounted that idea due to the slow progress of the light.  the speed of the light seemed relative to a small propeller plane traveling at 10-15,000 feet.  there was no noise and the light was bright and steady with no sign of any smoke or ejection of any burning matter.  all that was visible was the orange glow.  the shape of the light was something between rectangular to elliptical.  as this object was passing from view, another orange light, that appeared identical to the first one, came into view.  this one seemed closer, more like a small plane at 5-10,000 feet.  i would estimate the apparent size of the second light as one quarter of a lunar diameter.

i live near a small airport and always keep an eye to the sky.  these lights are like no aircraft i've ever seen.  these were not satellites.  this bore no resemblance to the photos of the shuttle columbia re-entry.
content.summary: 2 slow moving orange lights moving silently north to south in upstate ny

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from visiting my mother and when i pulled into my drive way and got out of my truck and started walking to my front door i noticed a bright light over my woods behind my house.At first i thought it was a helicopter with its search light on pointing in my direction maybe looking for marijuana grows or escaping criminal suspects but that was clearly not the case as it approched my backyard i did not hear any sound what so ever except the occasional bullfrog cherping. now it was very slowly moving towards the roof of my house not to mention it had seem to be about anywhere between 50-80 ft above my roof and between 30-60ft diameter.As it hovered over my directly over my head at that exact moment a 747-777 was flying from the right of the object to the left from my point of view and the plane was with out a doubt anywhere between 13,000-26,000ft with the normal nav lights blinking. but when the plane crossed over it the plane dissapeared behind it for a few moments and reemerged on the other side! after a moment or two the object started to move foward again and then abruptly turned to the left and flew off like a bat out of hell! if i had blinked i would have missed it! now as for what it looked like the best way i can describe it is that it looked like a perfectly round black and greyish marble that had a very bright light surrounding it like a aura around it! i also had time to notice and realize that for as huge,bright and close as it was it did not reflect any light on the ground or tree tops like the moon does when it is out! aslo like to mention even though i think i could be crazy for saying this but when it hovered over me something was telepathically talking to me telling me something will happen very soon and it has been watching me for awhile now and the rest the message is "classified"! i'm sorry but i feel to afraid to talk about the rest of the message in fear that "they" will stiffle me under the "patriot act" if "they" were to track this email to my address! also the pictures i submited to mufon show the object taking off in great haste if you know where to look on the pictures!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was in awe from what i was witnessing

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were drinking coffee early on the morning of august 22, 2011. at approximately 6:15am, the moon (and what i believe is mars) were still visisble in the night sky. and it was between those two brightest points, we saw a white-lighted disc traveling at a very high rate of speed--faster than what could be a satellite. the altitude was approximately 50,000 feet. we watched as the object fluttered out. as we were talking about this event, the same or different object reaappears. it flies in a oblong pattern, then flutters out. a few minutes later, either the same object just closer, or a bigger one altogether reappears out of thin air, stays in the same position then flutters out.
content.summary: Three lighted discs on obscure path over great falls, va

content.detailedDescription:
On august 19, 2011 @ approximately 9:30 pm, after attending the ethnic enrichment festival @ swope park in kansas city, missouri, we were sitting on a set of steps to the south of the festival.  we were up a hill and far away (approximately 200 yards) from the lights that were being emitted from the festival.  this was giving us a good view of kansas city toward the north. upon leaving the steps, in the north sky, we both saw a rather large "comet-like" object travelling eastward and horizontal to the horizon.  at first, we both thought it was a meteor (albeit the best and largest one either one of us had ever seen).  this changed when the object broke apart and a section decended 90 degrees vertical toward the horizon.  like the first section, this second section also appeared to be on fire.  this occurrence allowed us to believe that perhaps we had seen two aircraft collide.  the second section travelled toward the ground/horizon at a faster rate that the section travelling eastward.  when this second section reached what appeared to be a few hundred feet above the earth, it stopped and hovered.  at that point, it did not change direction vertically or horizontally.  it simply didn't move at all.  the first section continued to travel toward the east.  approximately one minute from the first part of the sighting, both objects immediately disappeared/vanished. 
we made our way back to the car in dismay to the fact that no one else appeared to have seen the same thing.  with much excitement, we decided to get in the car and head north on us-71 highway toward the area in which the second object appeared to "hover".  
approximately 7 or 8 minutes after our first sighting, upon travelling northbound on the highway, we saw a very similar object to the first one we had seen travelling vertically toward the earth.  it appeared to be on fire just as the first two only minutes before had appeared.  a few thousand feet above the earth, it broke apart into five other "star-like" shapes and stopped.  these star-like objects appeared to surround or rotate around the initial object.  all objects at that point began to take an eastward route toward independence, missouri.  we observed all of this second sighting while travelling northbound on us-71.  this second sighting lasted approximately two to three minutes.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering

content.detailedDescription: On the night of friday aug,20,2011, as i was going to get something to eat at 9:00 at night. i left my house and drove east over the f.M.1960 bridge crossing over lake houston. as i entered the bridge i could see an object moving very slowly almost stationary over the east side of the bride. as i approached the object i could see (thru my sun roof)a triangular shaped craft illuminated by its 5 bright white lights. the object was almost directly over me at an altitude of around 500 feet. i could make out the outline of the craft by its lights illuminating the object. it seemed to be almost drifting towards the northwest had no sound and was around 150 feet in diameter. after crossing the bridge and wanting another look at this strange object i did a u-turn and crossed the bridge again heading west. the object was moving north at this point and was around a mile away. i know other people must have seen the object as there were others crossing the bridge as well. ive lived here for 3 years and seen thousands of planes fly over the lake. this was not ur typical airplane and unlike anything i have ever seen.
content.summary: Saw an unidentified object over lake houston 8/20/11.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a bright pulsating yellow/white object hovering over
bear mountain from palm springs calofornia at 5:00am this morning.

it slowly descended from the top of the mountain, and i observed it 
descent fron 10,500 ft to about 4000 ft in less then 10 seconds.
i kept wanting to rationalize this thinking that this was some sort of plane crash - but there
was no explosion.

i did not seen anything on the news about this.  i cannot be the only person who saw this.

randal ollinger
content.summary: Saw unidentifed object over bear mouintain in so. ca

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on the back porch around 11pm when two red spheres appeared from the east moving west at normal aircraft speed.  i first thaught it could be military but there were no flashing lights.  all of the sudden the one closest to the ground curved upwards toward the one above, merged into one entity and began to pulsate.  it was like a mile high strobe light.  what happened next is completely irrational in human terms.  the object began to move up and down vertically at a speed unknown to man and faster than anything i have ever scene.  i ran inside and dragged my poor mother outside by her arm.  by then the object had slowed down and it disappeared over the mountain in a westerly fashion.  freaked out and in disbelief i countinued to observe what looked like flashes of lightning for an hour or so, although there were no clouds and the nearest thunderstorm activity was hundreds of miles away in kentucky.  i've been looking up for years and feel it necessary to report this dramatic event.  god be with us all.
content.summary: Two red orbs appeared from the east moving west at the same rate of speed, became one pulsating orb that changed directions and disappeared to the west.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on i-275 at 8:40pm clear sky just after sunset with good visibility.  dark object crossing freeway from west to east.  no reference point to determine size or altitude.  thought it might have been a bird or airplane.  object appeared to bank to its right and revealed 5 or 6 bright white lights in a straight line on its upper surface.  not a configuration that should be on any aircraft and not a bird.  

object then appeared to bank to it's left and then became small and could no longer be seen.

wondered what it was.  have seen kites flying west of the freeway near 6 mile road, but this did not resemble anything seen there before.  thought it might be a model airplane but it was operating far from where anyone could have controlled it.
content.summary: Object in sky at sunset that disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying in my back yard reading a book while sun tanning.  i looked straight up and saw this bean very high in the sky with white lights that came on and off in no specific sequence.   at first, i thought it must have been a glare from my sun glasses but when i removed them the object was still there.   i then got up to look at the object from a different perspective and it remained at the same hovering spot.  because it was at a great height, i could not guess as to the length but i would say it was as long as a 737 airplane.   the beam was not cigar shaped, rather more rectangular.

i eventually when back to my reading and when i glanced up, it was gone.
content.summary: A single silver
